channel.title: Tippmann Black Ops Nuketown Paintball Field
channel.description:
I was scrolling down on Facebook and saw a picture of Nuketown, which is usually because I liked all of the main Call of Duty pages. But it also mentioned that it was a paintball field. So, I Googled it and found some more pictures and information about it. I think it's pretty cool.
http://www.charlieintel.com/2013/05/14/real-life-nuketown-paintball-field-recreated-by-tippmann/
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4LlpWjr.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:519667”]Does it blow up at the end of the game?[/quote]Yeah actually they have sprinkler system, that spews out paint at the end of each match.

item.title: Tippmann Black Ops Nuketown Paintball Field
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I was scrolling down on Facebook and saw a picture of Nuketown, which is usually because I liked all of the main Call of Duty pages. But it also mentioned that it was a paintball field. So, I Googled it and found some more pictures and information about it. I think it’s pretty cool.

Charlie INTEL – 14 May 13

Real life 'Nuketown' Paintball Field recreated by Tippmann | Charlie INTEL

[nggallery id=487] “Nuketown 2013” is a paintball event/field that was sponsored by Tippmann (manufactures of Paintball gear) which opened this weekend at Paintball Explosion, a paintball field located in East Dundee, Illinois. The event turned out...
